StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWeeklyContractsRpt]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int, @RecruiterID uniqueidentifier = null, @StartDt date.me, @EndDt date.me )
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SET @EndDt = CAST( (STR(Year(@EndDt)) + '-' + STR(MONTH(@EndDt)) + '-' + STR(DAY(@EndDt)) ) AS date.me) SET @EndDt = DATEADD(day, 1, @EndDt)
SELECT p.ProspectId, n.NWA_ID AS NwaId, COALESCE(per1.LAST_NAME,per2.LastName) + ', ' + COALESCE(per1.FIRST_NAME,per2.FirstName) [Name], p.Ac.vity AS Ac.vity, p.Source, hs.HighSchool_Name [School], rp.Rank_Code + ' ' + pr.Last_Name [Recruiter], pp.PhoneNumber [Telephone] ,NULL as Note ,NULL as Comment ,NULL as disposi.on FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA AS n INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON per1 ON n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = per1.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.MIContract mi ON mi.NWA_ID = n.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_PERSON rp on rp.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = n.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.PERSON pr on pr.Person_Id = rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p ON p.NwaId = n.rowguid LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person per2 ON per2.PersonId = p.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.PersonPhone pp ON per2.PersonId = pp.PersonId AND pp.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool ps inner join (SELECT ProspectId, Max(LastUpdateDate) as updatedate from Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectSchool group by prospec.d) maxschool on maxschool.prospec.d = ps.prospec.d and ps.lastupdatedate = maxschool.updatedate) ON ps.ProspectId = p.ProspectId LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.HIGH_SCHOOL hs on hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId
WHERE rp.ORGANIZATION_ID = @OrgID AND (mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE >= @StartDt and mi.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE < @EndDt) AND (rp.rowguid = @RecruiterID OR @RecruiterID IS NULL)
END
